page.title: 19A SCHOOLCHILD'S DAY
page.content: Class 2, 5-7 years wake up at 7am.,get up dress go downstairs, have break fast.Some walk to school,come by bike or have a lift by car to arrive by 9. We sit at desks and work in maths books with pencils and crayons to learn about adding up and weighing and measuring.We all have reading books.We weed the school garden.We sew a toy mouse.We paint pictures.After lunch we play on the grass.We have Sports and run races.We go home with our Mums at 3.3O.First we say a prayer.Lighten our darkness we beseech Thee O Lord...At home we play ball,ride bikes,play on the swing.Later we watch television. After tea we wash, shower or bath going to bed at 7pm.
